pullRequest.title: A handful of random mappings
pullRequest.bodyText: Im not usually one to create mappings, but I wanted something else to do for a bit.

nodes.bodyText:
Should be net/minecraft/util/JsonSerializableType
What's the difference between this and JsonSerializable?
Does this save a path or get a save path? Getters should have get.
functions and tags should probably have get as well?
This one is also missing get.
More like a function loader, as we still have the old command function manager

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 1 isDedicatedServer
          
          
            
            		ARG 1 dedicated
more like functionLoader, re. advancement manager vs loader
Imo just getTag if it returns an empty tag for an nonexistent one.
